title: So Much News, So Little Time - Trump Aims Tweets at Syria & Paul Ryan Is Retiring | Martellus Bennett
itunes:title: So Much News, So Little Time - Trump Aims Tweets at Syria & Paul Ryan Is Retiring | Martellus Bennett
description:
Trevor covers the latest onslaught of big stories, and Martellus Bennett chats about post-NFL life and his children's book "Hey A.J., It's Bedtime!"
